system.description:
Up to four persons touched by the caster are refreshed, some of their lost hit points being temporarily restored.

  • Bonus hit points: Each subject gains a number of bonus hit points equal to 50% of the number of hit points he or she is currently below maximum. For example, if the subject has a maximum of 30 hit points and a current total of 12 hit points, he or she gains 9 bonus hit points (50% of 18).

  • Any damage suffered: Is subtracted first from the bonus hit points.

  • When the duration ends: If any of the bonus hit points remain, they disappear.
